name: splitogram
description: Telegram Mini App for splitting group expenses with on-chain USDT settlement

scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:frontend
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'wrangler dev.*8787' || true; pkill -f 'vite' || true; pkill -f 'workerd' || true; echo 'Dev servers stopped'
scripts.test: bun run test:backend && bun run test:frontend
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:backend && bun run typecheck:frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:backend && bun run lint:frontend
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.db:migrate:local: bunx wrangler d1 migrations apply splitogram-db --local
